headline: Jim Cramer on General Mills: “The Stock’s Going to Go Down Anyway”
summary: General Mills, Inc. (NYSE:GIS) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared his views on. A caller asked if Cramer has shifted his stance on the company, and he replied: “Yeah, I’ve gone from here to here, meaning, no, not much stance changed at all. Here’s the problem: This is one of those companies that, […]

headline: 3 Dividend Stocks to Hold for the Next 20 Years
summary: Consumer staples companies make the things people need, and that will never go out of style -- even if the stocks sometimes do.
